Name: Animal Friendship
Components: V, S, F, M (some food, which the target consumes)

Name: Ceremony
Components: V, S, F, M (25 gp worth of powdered silver, which the spell consumes)

Name: Create or Destroy Water
Components: V, S, F, M (a drop of water if creating water)

Name: Identify
Components: V, S, M (a mystic quartz worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Protection from Evil or Good
Components: V, S, M (holy/unholy water, depending on target alignment, or powdered silver and iron, which the spell consumes)

Name: Augury
Components: V, S, F, M (a holy symbol worth at least 25 gp)

Name: Continual Flame
Components: V, S, M (ruby dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Deceptive Aura
Components: V, S, M (a handful of apatite dust, which the spell consumes, and a small square of silk)

Name: Gentle Repose
Components: V, S, M (holy water, which the spell consumes, and one coin placed on each of the corpse's eyes, which must remain there for the duration)

Name: Warding Bond
Components: V, S, F, M (a pair of white gold rings worth at least 50 gp each, which you and target must wear for the duration)

Name: Clairvoyance
Components: V, S, M (a cosmic opal worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Glyph of Warding
Components: V, S, M (incense and powdered gemstone worth at least 200 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Magic Circle
Components: V, S, M (a component depending on the effect, which the spell consumes)

Name: Nondetection
Components: V, S, M (apatite dust worth at least 25 gp sprinkled over the target, which the spell consumes)

Name: Remove Curse
Components: V, S, F, M (incense and one of the following: holy water, a vial of mercury worth at least 50 gp, diamond dust worth at least 50 gp, or cosmic opal dust worth at least 50 gp, all of which the spell consumes)

Name: Revivify
Components: V, S, M (diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Sending
Components: V, S, M (a lapis lazuli, a sapphire, a cosmic opal or a TSR device)

Name: Speak with the Dead
Components: V, S, F, M (burning incense imbued with onyx dust)

Name: Banishment
Components: V, S, M (an item distasteful to the target)

Name: Divination
Components: V, S, M (incense and a sacrificial offering appropriate to your religion, together worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Ethereal Storage
Components: V, S, M (an exquisite chest, 3 feet by 2 feet by 2 feet, constructed from rare materials worth at least 5,000 gp, and a Tiny replica made from the same materials worth at least 50 gp)

Name: Stoneskin
Components: V, S, M (a peridot worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Commune
Components: V, S, M (incense and a vial of holy or unholy water)

Name: Dawn
Components: V, S, M (a fiery beryl worth at least 100 gp)

Name: Dispel Evil or Good
Components: V, S, M (holy or unholy water, which this spell consumes)

Name: Greater Restoration
Components: V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Hallow
Components: V, S, M (herbs, oils, and incense worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Legend Lore
Components: V, S, M (incense worth at least 500 gp and four gems, all of which the spell consumes)

Name: Planar Binding
Components: V, S, F, M (a gemstone worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Raise Dead
Components: V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 500 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Scrying
Components: V, S, M (either a focus worth at least 10,000 gp, such as a crystal ball,  a silver mirror, or a font filled with holy water, or a cosmic opal worth at least 1,000 gp)

Name: Teleportation Circle
Components: V, M (rare chalks and lapis lazuli ink worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Create Undead
Components: V, S, M (an onyx worth at least 150 gp for each corpse)

Name: Find the Path
Components: V, S, M (a map, compasses worth at least 100 gp and an object from the location you wish to find)

Name: Forbiddance
Components: V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy or unholy water, rare incense, and powdered gemstone worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: Heroes' Feast
Components: V, S, M (a gem-encrusted bowl worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

Name: True Seeing
Components: V, S, M (an ointment for the eyes that contains mystic quartz dust worth at least 25 gp and is consumed by the spell)
